name: Horse Racing - Race Horses Derby 3D
description:
Horse Racing - Race Horses Derby 3D

Take your race horse for a gallop on the turf in the sport of king’s favourite equestrian sport!

Race thoroughbred Arabian stallions using your skills as a jockey to particiapate in either, flat racing (endurance) or steeplechase (vaulting obstacles). The races take place on either dirt tracks or turf tracks


If you are looking for an easy, exciting, fun, highly addictive horse racing game and sporting challenge then saddle up and get ready to be the king of the turf

The game mixes a cool arcade style with some simulation aspects. Take your favourite racehorse for a gallop on the racetrack!

Use your winnings to win races and buy better horses, such as thoroughbred, stallion and Arabian

[FEATURES]
Flat Racing(An endurance turf or dirt track).
Gallop at a fast pace and close the distance to the finish line

Steeplechase (An endurance turf or dirt track).
Control your jockey by vaulting over obstacles

+ Realtime 3D Graphics.
+ Simple to Play.
+ Grass track.
+ Turf track.
